panels.visual: Party members touching temples Seeing spectral runic interfaces
panels.dialogue: Pocky: "I can feel it... the Orrery is reaching out!" Lunara: "Nature... Celestial... Mechanistic... they're all singing!"

panels.visual: Combat beginning Initiative order visible Everyone in action poses **Caption:** "BATTLE BEGINS!"
Val attempting to tune Nature lens Green energy flowing through him
One lens clicking into better alignment Alric's barrier weakening slightly **Sound EFFECTS:** "CLICK-HUMMM"
